method.name: Clean_Data
method.brief: Cleans the data cache out to RAM. The start and end are relative to the page being serviced.

param.name: start_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page inclusive.

param.name: end_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page exclusive.

method.name: Invalidate_Data
method.brief: Invalidates the cache range within the given page. The start and end are relative to the page being serviced and should be aligned to a cache line boundary where possible. An additional clean is performed on the outer cache lines if the start and end are not aligned, to clean out the bytes between the requested and the cache line boundary.

param.name: start_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page inclusive.

param.name: end_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page exclusive.

method.name: CleanInvalidate_Data
method.brief: Clean and invalidates the cache range within the given page. The range will be flushed out to RAM. The start and end are relative to the page being serviced.

param.name: start_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page inclusive.

param.name: end_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page exclusive.

method.name: Unify_Instruction
method.brief: Unify Instruction Cache. Cleans data lines to point of unification, invalidate corresponding instruction lines to point of unification, then invalidates branch predictors. The start and end are relative to the page being serviced.

param.name: start_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page inclusive.

param.name: end_offset
param.description: The offset, relative to the start of the page exclusive.

interface.name: seL4_ARM_ASIDControl
interface.cap_description: The master ASIDControl capability being operated on.

method.name: MakePool
method.description: Together with a capability to , which is passed as an argument, create an . The untyped capability must represent a 4K memory object. This will create an ASID pool with enough space for 1024 VSpaces.

param.name: untyped
param.description: Capability to an untyped memory object that will become the pool. Must be 4K bytes.

param.name: root
param.description: CPTR to the CNode that forms the root of the destination CSpace. Must be at a depth of 32.

param.name: index
param.description: CPTR to the destination slot. Resolved from the root of the destination CSpace.

param.name: depth
param.description: Number of bits of index to resolve to find the destination slot.

interface.name: seL4_ARM_ASIDPool
interface.cap_description: The ASID pool which is being assigned to. Must not be full. Each ASID pool can contain 1024 entries.

method.name: Assign
method.description: Assigns an ASID to the VSpace passed in as an argument.

param.name: vspace
param.description: The VSpace that is being assigned to an ASID pool. Must not already be assigned to an ASID pool.

method.name: SetTCB
method.brief: Bind a TCB to a virtual CPU
method.description: There is a 1:1 relationship between a virtual CPU and a TCB. If either (or both) of them is associated with another one, they will be dissociated, and then associated to the ones called in this system calls.

param.name: tcb
param.description: Capability to TCB to bind to a virtual CPU
